table.result: Just a log that can be weilded as a two handed wand
Buyer beware, this tome is just a blank book
Makes the wearer an expert in all things related to wrapping.
The equipable hair bow enables the user to make shots no other could make at a distance of 10 ft.
A beautifully crafted miniature scene of a location, not to be confused with "sight"
A magical Mystical Object of Splendor and mystery, The sounds... wait sounds? This is a Pen? No it's a Pen not a Pen Pen... You know it keeps animals out, What do you think Handler's use pens for?
A scroll that has some oddly scribbled spells on it. Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday
When activated it summons four two legged horns that ram enemies at a rate of 1d6-5x4. Cannot discern living from inanimate.
Wizards from all around want this Potion! Bandits would steal for this Potion! If only it was the Potion of "Phasing" and not so disturbing
Instructions are attached "Step 1: find water... Step 2:... "
Why you would use a bow to make poached eggs, no-one knows, but it makes damn fine poached eggs. +5 to cooking checks on poached eggs.
Renders the imbiber invisible while they are yelling. Lasts 1 minute/5 minutes/10 minutes/1 day/1 week/forever (1d6 to determine quality).
While wearing the cloak, all inns, taverns, bars, pubs, and saloons give off a glow that is visable from a mile away and can be seen through anything
When worn by anyone these boots auto magically make the wearer (and any other creatures in a 69,420 mile radius) increase their speed by 30 feet
The ring is warm to the touch, uncomfortably so.
It's a functioning Deck of Many Things except every card is The Idiot.
A set of animated armor that likes to move only when being worn

As long as these bagpipes are being played, the player is completely invisible. Cannot be muffled/silenced. +10 to stealth checks, all hostile and friendly entities in a 30 ft radius gain +10 to perception checks.
A 5 foot loop of rope.
A coin that, while in your possession is worth 1gp. But when out of your possession is worth nothing.
